channel.title: Recipes on Wilson Zhao
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on Wilson Zhao

item.title: Ratatouille
item.description: Ingredients 4 tomatoes/6 roma tomatoes 1 green squash 1 yellow squash 1 zuccinni Assorted colored pepers Things you should always have: onions, garlic, olive oil, butter, S&P, chicken stock Aromatics: rosemary, thyme Directions Mandolin veggies at 1/8”? The thinner it is, the fancier it is. Use a sharp knife on tomatoes instead. Submerge tomatoes boiling water for 30s to make them easier to peel. Red Pepper Soup Knob of butter + olive oil.
